DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety tolerability investigational meningococcal B rLP2086 vaccine healthy adult .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Safety And Tolerability Of Meningococcal B Rlp2086 Vaccine In Healthy Adults
DOC.criteria: A subject must meet follow inclusion criterion screen ( visit 1 ) randomization ( visit 2 ) consider enrollment study : Male female subject age 18 40 . Healthy male female subject determine medical history , physical examination , judgment investigator . Male female subject consider biologically capable child must agree commit use reliable method birth control duration study 30 day early discontinuation . A subject still biologically capable child , even use contraceptive sexual partner sterile use contraceptive . In addition subject must meet follow inclusion criterion randomization ( visit 2 ) consider enrollment study . The referred blood urinalysis test ( inclusion criterion 5 ) perform blood urine sample take visit 1 : Female subject childbearing potential negative urine pregnancy test prior study drug administration . Note : criterion apply vaccination visit last study visit . Laboratory blood urinalysis test result within perprotocol normal range . Able contact telephone study period . Note : criterion apply study visit .
